SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compute URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_COMPUTE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_AUTH_TOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tenant Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_SERVER_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Action" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_IP_OPERATION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server IP" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_SERVER_IP#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!----Reading action key from VARA :SET &UC4RB_OPS_VARA_VALUE# = &UC4RB_OPS_IP_OPERATION# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_VARA_KEY :SET &UC4RB_OPS_IP_OPERATION# = &UC4RB_OPS_VARA_KEY#
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME# = "FLOATING_IP"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#, string, 14
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[3] = "-computeurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_COMPUTE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[5] = "-tokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[7] = "-tenantid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[9] = "-serverid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_SERVER_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[11] = "-floatingipaction" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_IP_OPERATION#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[13] = "-floatingip" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_SERVER_IP#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_OPS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_OPS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** IP OPERATIONS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** IP OPERATIONS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
